snippet.title: Aeolwyn's Legacy Indie Turn-Based RPG - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
An epic tale in a sprawling world filled with knights, kings, allies, and betrayal. Fight powerful monsters and loot their treasure!  Choose between real-time combat to slay your foes, or if you prefer to think more strategically about your battles, switch to turn-based and outsmart your enemies.  You can switch between the two any time you want. #turnbased #rpg #partybased

Official website:
https://www.brrappgames.com/aeolwyn-s-legacy

Thanks for watching it. Please subscribe to our channel and support us:
- Website: https://turnbasedlovers.com
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/turnbasedlovers
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/turnbasedlovers
- Steam Curator: https://store.steampowered.com/curator/29618454-Turn-based-games
- Humble Bundle: https://www.humblebundle.com/?partner=tbl
- Epic Games Store Tag: TURN-BASED-LOVER
